channel.title: Comments on: Win a DAB Radio
channel.description: Celebrating UK Radio in a day! - Tuesday 14th October 2014

item.title: By: Fred Bradley
item.dc:creator: Fred Bradley
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/10/win-a-dab-radio/#comment-2">Paul</a>.
I'm afraid not Paul, but plenty more chances to win throughout the day!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Paul.

I’m afraid not Paul, but plenty more chances to win throughout the day!

item.title: By: Paul
item.dc:creator: Paul
item.description: Do I win a radio for being the first person to comment here?!
item.content:encoded: Do I win a radio for being the first person to comment here?!
